Text: Having trouble playing the file, anyone got some info on what codecs this use ?
Try playing it using Windows Classic Media Player.
Absolutely no reason to ban this episode. Can't people handly a little criticism? :)

According to GSpot:

Video Source: MPEG2_VIDEO

Audio Source: MPEG2_AUDIO

Video Path: (S) --> MPEG-2 Demultiplexer --> Nero Video Decoder --> (R)

Audio Path: (S) --> MPEG-2 Demultiplexer --> AC3Filter --> (R)
I played it with Power DVD and it worked

I believe the person named it wrong should be boycotted.  Think the catholic church boycotted this episode i do not believe the FCC banned this episode or showtime would not let them air it. I beleive it aired on showtime on July 4th.

It wasn't banned at all. Someone didn't sign a release waiver so the show was pulled for legal reasons. This release exists for us to download because it was accidentally available on Showtime on Demand in Illinois.

This is a great episode btw. Religious icons are the indeed bullshit.
